overview_of_class:
Light and modern physics for scientists and engineers.

The following topics will be presented:

- Interference phenomena

- Wave-particle duality of light

- Early quantum theory and models of atoms

- Quantum mechanics of atoms and particles

- Introduction to special relativity
name: General Physics for ISP

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Light and modern physics for scientists and engineers.

The following topics will be presented:

- Interference phenomena

- Wave-particle duality of light

- Early quantum theory and models of atoms

- Quantum mechanics of atoms and particles

- Introduction to special relativity

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: To develop intuition for wave phenomena and to understand the basic principles of quantum mechanics and relativity.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Three lectures, a discussion section, and a two-hour lab per week.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: One midterm, weekly problem sets, lab grades, a final exam
